lead_paragraph: The New York Times/Stanford University/Resources for the Future Poll on global warming is based on telephone interviews conducted Jan. 7-22 with 1,006 adults.
snippet: The New York Times/Stanford University/Resources for the Future Poll on global warming is based on telephone interviews conducted Jan. 7-22 with 1,006 adults.

headline.main: How the Poll on Global Warming Was Conducted
